name: TerraTheForgotten
description:
Terra a place once free, it is now ruled by invaders.

You play as Greystone a humble adventurer, With many companions in the land of terra.

Companions

Sun Wukong

Sun Wukong got lost on his journey to the west, but being cheeky he decides to stay with you until you complete your quest.

Terra

Terra born from a tribe of warriors her mothered named her after the land, she now searches for the keys of Terra to Free the land once more.

Shop NPC

Muscle Cat

use to be a small little kitten

Yin

Sadistic in nature she finds joy in torturing Curious Adventurers

Landmarks
